prediction: Jay and Joe are going to Kenya to see a diamond concert. Jay has convinced Ruth and Paulette to go with them. Joe is going to pay Jay back for the tickets.

reference: Maya wants Boris to bring clothes that are hanging outside. Brian will do that, because Boris isn't at home now.

prediction: Brook tells Gyle that something happened yesterday and he needs to come home.
